Question
========

A person achieves a score of 14.5 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 15.2 with a standard deviation 1.6. The z-score of the person with 14.5 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -1.56
* -0.78
* -0.44

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-1.56: Incorrect
-0.78: Incorrect
-0.44: Correct
